title: ODS Event Response Schema
description: This Schema defines the event data repsonse from ODS to any and all incoming event data from source systems

EnterpriseEventID.description: The Unique Event ID generated in ODS for the current event request from Source system

EventBusinessID.description: The business ID provided by the Source system in the Event request

EventStatus.description: The status of the event request within ODS

EventErrorCode.description: The unique error code identifying Business and System Faults to consumers

EventStatusMessage.description: Any pertaining event message that may be needed for the source system. This will be used mostly to describe any error message or description from ODS.

MustRetryFlag.description: This flag indicates if the event needs to be retried from the source system in case of any error.
